thag6.5:1.3: plavatī → plavati (bj, mr); pariplavati (sya1ed, sya2ed); palavatī (pts1ed, pts2ed)
thag6.5:2.4: abhivaṭṭhaṁva → abhivuṭṭhaṁva (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts2ed); abhivaḍḍhaṁva (pts1ed, mr)
thag6.5:6.1: pamādo → pamādo rajo sabbadā (bj, mr); pamādo rajo (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed)
thag6.5:6.5: Mālukyaputto → māluṅkyaputto (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed)
